query:
UPDATE documents 
SET 
  fileUrl = REPLACE(fileUrl, '.docx', '.pdf'),
  fileKey = REPLACE(fileKey, '.docx', '.pdf'),
  name = REPLACE(name, '.docx', '.pdf'),
  mimeType = 'application/pdf'
WHERE fileUrl LIKE '%.docx%' OR name LIKE '%.docx%' OR mimeType LIKE '%word%';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2cdS9hyY6XNQUTe.root --database 2rtwtAqF2DqhH9oEcii9XY --execute UPDATE documents 
SET 
  fileUrl = REPLACE(fileUrl, '.docx', '.pdf'),
  fileKey = REPLACE(fileKey, '.docx', '.pdf'),
  name = REPLACE(name, '.docx', '.pdf'),
  mimeType = 'application/pdf'
WHERE fileUrl LIKE '%.docx%' OR name LIKE '%.docx%' OR mimeType LIKE '%word%';
